items.title: Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN) Stock Could Soar on AI and Economic Resilience, Say Top Firms
items.description: We recently published a list of 11 AI Stocks Shaking Up Wall Street Today. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) stands against other AI stocks shaking up Wall Street today. It hasn’t been long since DeepSeek released its efficient yet low-cost models, causing a frenzy in […]

items.title: Target makes bold move to answer Walmart, Amazon
items.description: Target unveils a new strategy to take down its rivals.

items.title: The Allure of Amazon Shares
items.description: Bloomberg's Ryan Vlastelica explains how Amazon shares are stacking up against big tech and retail competitors. He speaks with Caroline Hyde on "Bloomberg Technology".

items.title: Amazon introduces beta AI shopping tool, 'Interests'
items.description: A new artificial intelligence tool that surfaces products based on interests has been introduced by Amazon to some shoppers in the U.S. It is called "Interests."
